entry.title: Tutorial: Package and Dependency Management with Poetry
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: Steph Samson

Track:PyConDE Poetry is “Python packaging and dependency management made easy.”It not only packages up your libraries easily but also isolates environments and resolves dependencies — all with an intuitive command line interface.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference. https://pycon.de

More details …
entry.content:
Description

Speaker: Steph Samson

Track:PyConDE Poetry is “Python packaging and dependency management made easy.”It not only packages up your libraries easily but also isolates environments and resolves dependencies — all with an intuitive command line interface.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference. https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/CFPRJ8 Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde

entry.title: From Data to Deliverable - Steph Samson
